mapper.select: select s.pid,df.id as dfillid, df.fillyear,d.enterpriceId,df.deviceid,df.fuelid,d.deviceTypeId2,ft.pollutantId,ft.factor,scontent,ashcontent,voccontent,mTotalYear,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12 from ap_devfill df join ap_devices d on df.deviceid=d.id join ap_factor ft on ft.productId=df.fuelid AND ft.formulaId>0 left join ap_static s on df.fuelid=s.id where df.status = 3 and s.name is not null and d.devClass=0 and (ft.factor = 0 or ft.factor > 0) and df.fillyear=#{fillyear} UNION select s.pid,df.id as dfillid, df.fillyear,d.enterpriceId,df.deviceid,df.fuelid,d.deviceTypeId2,ft.pollutantId,ft.factor,scontent,ashcontent,voccontent,mTotalYear,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12 from ap_devfill df join ap_devices d on df.deviceid=d.id JOIN ap_enterprise e ON d.enterpriceId = e.id join ap_factor ft on (ft.productId+100145)=df.fuelid AND ft.tradeid = e.trade1 AND ft.formulaId = d.deviceTypeId2 left join ap_static s on df.fuelid=s.id where df.status = 3 and s.name is not null and d.devClass=0 and (ft.factor = 0 or ft.factor > 0) and df.fillyear=#{fillyear}

select fd.deviceid, fd.facilityId, f.pollutantId, s2.name, avg(s2.unit) as dsrate, avg(s2.remark) as dsrate2 from ap_facility_device fd left join ap_control_facilities f on fd.facilityId=f.id left join ap_static s2 on s2.id = f.technique2 where f.enabled = 1 group by fd.deviceid, f.pollutantid;
${sql}

select pf.id as pfillid,pf.fillyear,pf.enterpriceId,pf.productId, ft.pollutantId, ft.factor,p.productName,realoutput,pf.m1,pf.m2,pf.m3,pf.m4,pf.m5,pf.m6,pf.m7,pf.m8,pf.m9,pf.m10,pf.m11,pf.m12 from ap_product_fill pf join ap_product p on pf.productid=p.id join ap_factor ft on p.groupid= ft.groupid OR p.groupid=ft.productId join ap_producestep s on s.id=pf.produceStepId left join ap_enterprise e on pf.enterpriceId = e.id where pf.status = 3 and ft.factor is not null and pf.fillyear=#{fillyear};

select pf.id as pfillid, pf.productId, f.pollutantId, avg(s2.unit) as dsrate, avg(s2.remark) as dsrate2 from ap_product_fill pf left join ap_facility_step fs on pf.produceStepId=fs.stepid left join ap_control_facilities f on f.id=fs.facilityid left join ap_static s2 on f.technique2=s2.id where f.enabled = 1 and pf.productId > 0 and f.pollutantId > 0 group by pf.id, pf.productId, f.pollutantId;

select pf.id as pfillid,pf.fillyear,pf.enterpriceId,pf.productId, ft.pollutantId, mf.materialId, p.productName, m.materialName, mf.consumeOfYear, ft.factor from ap_product_fill pf join ap_product p on pf.productid=p.id join ap_factor ft on p.groupid= ft.groupid OR p.groupid=ft.productId join ap_material_fill mf on mf.productFillId=pf.id left join ap_material m on mf.materialId=m.id where pf.status = 3 and ft.materialId > 0 and ft.typeid < 4 and pf.fillyear=#{fillyear};

select af.productid, s.name, af.pollutantId, p.pollutantName, af.factor from ap_pollutant p left join ap_factor af on p.id = af.pollutantId join ap_static s on s.id = af.productid where af.typeid = 1;

select af.productid, s.productName, af.pollutantId, p.pollutantName, af.factor from ap_pollutant p left join ap_factor af on p.id = af.pollutantId join ap_product s on s.id = af.productid where af.typeid = 2;
SELECT * FROM ap_gasstation a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province>0
SELECT * FROM ap_gasstation a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province=0
SELECT * FROM ap_household_fuel a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province>0
SELECT * FROM ap_household_fuel a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province=0

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,a.ferType,IFNULL(SUM(a.amountTotal),0) AS amountTotal,IFNULL(SUM(a.m1),0) AS m1,IFNULL(SUM(a.m2),0) AS m2,IFNULL(SUM(a.m3),0) AS m3,IFNULL(SUM(a.m4),0) AS m4,IFNULL(SUM(a.m5),0) AS m5,IFNULL(SUM(a.m6),0) AS m6,IFNULL(SUM(a.m7),0) AS m7,IFNULL(SUM(a.m8),0) AS m8,IFNULL(SUM(a.m9),0) AS m9,IFNULL(SUM(a.m10),0) AS m10,IFNULL(SUM(a.m11),0) AS m11,IFNULL(SUM(a.m12),0) AS m12 FROM ap_nfertilizer a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province>0 GROUP BY a.province,a.city,a.town,a.ferType

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,a.ferType,IFNULL(SUM(a.amountTotal),0) AS amountTotal,IFNULL(SUM(a.m1),0) AS m1,IFNULL(SUM(a.m2),0) AS m2,IFNULL(SUM(a.m3),0) AS m3,IFNULL(SUM(a.m4),0) AS m4,IFNULL(SUM(a.m5),0) AS m5,IFNULL(SUM(a.m6),0) AS m6,IFNULL(SUM(a.m7),0) AS m7,IFNULL(SUM(a.m8),0) AS m8,IFNULL(SUM(a.m9),0) AS m9,IFNULL(SUM(a.m10),0) AS m10,IFNULL(SUM(a.m11),0) AS m11,IFNULL(SUM(a.m12),0) AS m12 FROM ap_nfertilizer a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province=0 GROUP BY a.province,a.city,a.town,a.ferType

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,a.ferType,IFNULL(SUM(a.amountTotal),0) AS amountTotal FROM ap_nfertilizer a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province>0 GROUP BY a.province,a.city,a.town

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,a.ferType,IFNULL(SUM(a.amountTotal),0) AS amountTotal FROM ap_nfertilizer a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province=0 GROUP BY a.province,a.city,a.town

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,(a.yield*c.BurnRatio*c.RiceGrassDryRatio*c.RiceGrassRatio*d.factor*e.factor)/1000 AS statvalue,f.id AS pollutantId,c.`name` AS stattype3,d.factor AS stat_factor,concat(a.yield,' X ',c.BurnRatio,' X ',c.RiceGrassDryRatio,' X ',c.RiceGrassRatio,' X ',d.factor,' X ',e.factor,' /1000') AS stat_value FROM ap_firewood a JOIN ap_static b ON a.cropType=b.id JOIN ap_firewood_param c ON b.`name`=c.`name` LEFT JOIN ap_govfactor d ON c.`name`=d.type_x AND d.type_x2='EF因子' JOIN ap_govfactor e ON d.id+1=e.id AND e.type_x2='燃烧比例' JOIN ap_pollutant f ON f.pollutantName=d.type_y LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND d.factor>0 AND e.factor>0 AND e1.province>0

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,(a.yield*c.BurnRatio*c.RiceGrassDryRatio*c.RiceGrassRatio*d.factor*e.factor)/1000 AS statvalue,f.id AS pollutantId,c.`name` AS stattype3,d.factor AS stat_factor,concat(a.yield,' X ',c.BurnRatio,' X ',c.RiceGrassDryRatio,' X ',c.RiceGrassRatio,' X ',d.factor,' X ',e.factor,' /1000') AS stat_value FROM ap_firewood a JOIN ap_static b ON a.cropType=b.id JOIN ap_firewood_param c ON b.`name`=c.`name` LEFT JOIN ap_govfactor d ON c.`name`=d.type_x AND d.type_x2='EF因子' JOIN ap_govfactor e ON d.id+1=e.id AND e.type_x2='燃烧比例' JOIN ap_pollutant f ON f.pollutantName=d.type_y LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND d.factor>0 AND e.factor>0 AND e1.province=0
SELECT a.* FROM ap_constructiondust a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e ON a.accountid=e.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e.province>0
SELECT a.* FROM ap_constructiondust a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e ON a.accountid=e.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e.province=0

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,a.etype,b.`name` AS etypeName,a.area,c.`name` AS areaName,a.enumber,a.emodel FROM ap_equipment a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e ON a.accountid=e.id LEFT JOIN ap_static b ON a.etype=b.id LEFT JOIN ap_static c ON a.area=c.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e.province>0

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,a.etype,b.`name` AS etypeName,a.area,c.`name` AS areaName,a.enumber,a.emodel FROM ap_equipment a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e ON a.accountid=e.id LEFT JOIN ap_static b ON a.etype=b.id LEFT JOIN ap_static c ON a.area=c.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e.province=0

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,SUM(a.fuelconsume) AS fuelconsume,CONCAT(a.farmtype,a.farmtype2) AS farmtype FROM ap_equipment_farm a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND a.fuelconsume>0 AND e1.province>0 GROUP BY a.city,CONCAT(a.farmtype,a.farmtype2)

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,SUM(a.fuelconsume) AS fuelconsume,CONCAT(a.farmtype,a.farmtype2) AS farmtype FROM ap_equipment_farm a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND a.fuelconsume>0 AND e1.province=0 GROUP BY a.city,CONCAT(a.farmtype,a.farmtype2)

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,IFNULL(SUM(a.ksPitch+a.ksCement),0) AS ksPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.cgCement+a.cgPitch),0) AS cgPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.zgCement+a.zgPitch),0) AS zgPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.zCement+a.zPitch),0) AS zPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.ksNotShop),0) AS ksNotShop FROM ap_road_dust a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province>0 GROUP BY a.town

SELECT a.fillyear,a.province,a.city,a.town,IFNULL(SUM(a.ksPitch+a.ksCement),0) AS ksPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.cgCement+a.cgPitch),0) AS cgPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.zgCement+a.zgPitch),0) AS zgPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.zCement+a.zPitch),0) AS zPitch,IFNULL(SUM(a.ksNotShop),0) AS ksNotShop FROM ap_road_dust a LEFT JOIN ap_enterprise e1 ON a.accountid=e1.id WHERE a.`status`=3 AND a.fillyear=#{fillyear} AND e1.province=0 GROUP BY a.town
